name: 劉傳銘
objective: 本課程提供行動計算上一些主題之深入介紹，這些主題包括：(1)行動通訊及系統介紹，(2)資料管理(3)行動資料庫及交易管理(4)位置管理(5)行動IP(6)單一/多人路由(7)資訊安全
schedule:
mobile computing overview
state-of-art mobile communication systems
data dissemination
data management
location management
mobile agent
location-aware/context-dependent applications
ad-hoc networks
sensor networks
security
scorePolicy:
Class Participation:   5%
Presentation:         20% 
Midterm Report:       25% 
Semester Project:     50%
materials:
-Ad Hoc Wireless Networks, C. Siva Ram Murthy and B. S. Manjo, Prentice Hall, 2004.
-Mobile Ad Hoc Networking, S. Basagni, M. Conti, and S. Giordano, I Stojmenovic (ed.), IEEE Press, Wiley-Interscience, 2004.
-Handbook of Wireless Networks and Mobile Computing, I. Stojmenovic (ed.), Wiley, 2002.
-Mobile Communication, J. Schiller, Addison-Wesley, 2000.
-Data Management for Mobile Computing, E. Pitoura and G. Samaras , Kluwer Academic Publishers, 1998. 
-Mobile Computing ,T.  Imielinski and H. Korth, Kluwer Academic Publishers, 1996.
